description: Bringing a rich collection of home decor products from the house of Divya Bazaar Jaipuri Print 100% Pure Cotton King Size Bedsheet For full size Double Bed with 2 Pillow Covers (Jaipur Bedspreads) with a touch of comfort and easy. Adorned with a pretty printed pattern, this multicolor color printed pattern bed sheet is made from cotton fabric. A perfect jaipuri print bedsheet for everyday and every occasion.
